attributes.action: recognise the very serious concerns expressed by the Bishop of Rochester, to acknowledge that this situation is simply unacceptable,  and to take urgent action to open up No Go areas to make them safe for any member of the public to visit, walk through, & linger in at any time of the day or night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Islamic extremists have created "no-go" areas across Britain where it is too dangerous for non-Muslims to enter, one of the Church of England's most senior bishops warns today.

The Rt Rev Michael Nazir-Ali (the only C of E Bishop of Asian origin) has openly drawn attention to the fact that people of a different race or faith face physical attack if they live or work in communities dominated by a strict Muslim ideology.

The bishop's views have been confirmed by the many people who have posted their comments on the Daily Telegraph Website.

This is simply unacceptable and must be dealt with by our government using all the powers available to it.

rejection.details: Your petition is based on conjecture and cannot be substantiated as factually accurate.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
